1294:21: anuvicintayati yaddaśadikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannāḥ sarve buddhāścittotpādārambhe'dhunāhamivāsan kleśasvabhāvāante cābhavansamyaksambuddhā anuttarā bhagavanta iti heto rbodhicittamutpādayāmīti prathamā |
1294:22: anuvicintayati yat sarve triṣvadhvasu buddhā mahotsāhamudapādayan pṛthakpṛthagvāptumanuttarāṃ bodhim |
1294:23: yadi bodhiḥ prāptavyo dharmo mayāpi prāptavyetihetorutpādayāmi bodhicittamiti dvitīyā |
1294:24: anuvicintayati yatsarve triṣvadhvasu buddhā udapādayanmahāprajñāṃ pratyatiṣṭhipannādyāvaraṇe varacittaṃ saṃcinvanto duṣkaracaryāmudadīdharannātmānamatyakramiṣustridhātum |
1294:26: anuvicintayati yatsarve triṣvadhvanu buddhā lokanāyakāḥ pāraṃgatā jātijarāmaraṇakleśamahāsamudāt |
1294:27: ahamapi puruṣaḥ pāraṃ brajeyamiti hetoratpādayāmi bodhicittamiti caturthī |
1294:28: anuvicintayati yatsarve tripvadhvasu buddhā udapādayanmahāvīryamudasṛjannātmabhāvaṃ jīvitaṃ dhanāni cāmārgayansarvajñatām |
1294:29: ahamapi sāmpratamanusareyaṃ buddhāniti hetorutpādayāmi bodhicittamiti paṃcamī ||
1294:31: ātmānaṃ pratyavekṣate yatkāye 'sminnubhaye pañcaskandhāścaturmahābhūtāni kurvantyaprameyāṇyaśubhakarmāṇītikāmayate tatparityāgamiti prathamā |
1294:32: ātmānaṃ pratyavekṣate yatkāye'sminnavacchidrāṇi yebhyaḥ sravanti durgandhimalāmedhyānīti kurute taṃ pratyanādaramitidvitīyā |
1294:33: ātmānaṃ pratyavekṣate yatkāye'smillobhadveṣamohā aprameyāḥ kleśā nirdahanti kuśalacittamiti kāmayate nirvāpayitumiti tṛtīyā |
1294:34: ātmānaṃ pratyavekṣate yatkāyo'yaṃ fenabudbudavatkṣaṇaṃkṣaṇamutpadyate nirudhyate tena dharmāḥ prahātavyā iti kāmayate prahātumiti caturthī |
1294:35: ātmānaṃ pratyavekṣate yatkāyo'yamavidyāvṛtatayā sarvadā karityaśubhakarmāṇi saṃsarati ṣaḍgatiṣu na cāsya lābha iti paṃcamī |
1294:37: paśyati tathāgatānāṃ bhāsvaranirmalāṃ sallakṣaṇānuvyañjananiṣpattiṃ yāṃ saṃgacchataḥ kleśā vyapagatā bhavantīti saṃgṛhṇatīti prathamā |
1294:38: paśyati tathāgatānāṃ dharmakāyaṃ nityamavasthitaṃ pariśuddhaṃ niṣkalaṃkamiti saṃgṛhṇatīti dvitīyā |
1294:40: paśyati tathāgatānāṃ daśa balāni catvāri vaiśaradyāni mahākaruṇāṃ trīṇi smṛtyupasthānānīti saṃgṛhṇatīti caturthī |
1294:41: paśyati tathāgatānāṃ sarvajñatāṃ kṛpāṃ sattveṣu yanmaitrīkaruṇābhyāṃ samāvṛtya vibhrāntānnayati sarvānsanmārgamiti saṃgṛhṇatīti pañcamī ||
1294:51: paśyati sattvānutsṛjataḥ samyagdharmaṃ śraddaghānān mṛṣāmārgamiti tṛtīyam |
1294:54: paśyati sattvānbibhyato jātijarāvyādhimaraṇebhyo vimokṣamagaveṣayataḥ karmāṇi punaḥ kurvata iti prathamam |
1294:60: paśyati sattvāñjānato'pi kāmānāṃ duḥkhotpādakatamanutsṛjataḥ kāmāniti dvitīyaḥ |
1294:64: paśyati sattvānaparādhyatoguruśīlaṃ bhaye'pi pramādina iti prathamaḥ |
1294:65: paśyatisattvānkurvato'tyantāśubhāni pañcānantaryakarmāṇi drohāvṛtatvena notpādayato hriyamapatrapāṃceti dvitīyaḥ |
1294:67: paśyati sattvānbuddhimato'pyucchindataḥ kuśalamūlānyathāpi mānino na kadāpyanuśocata iti caturthaḥ ||
1294:69: paśyati sattvānaṣṭākṣaṇeṣu na śṛṇvataḥ saddharmamajānataścarituṃ kuśalamiti prathamam |
1294:70: paśyati sattvānbuddhotpāde nāpitaṃ saddharmaṃ śṛṇvato'pi na gṛhṇata iti dvitīyam |
1294:71: paśyati sattvānudgṛhṇata stairthikavādānkurvata ātmaklamathānuyogān nityamapagacchato vimokṣāditi tṛtīyam |
1294:72: dṛśyati sattvāṃllabdhaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāṃ nāma samādhi nirvāṇamivodgṛhṇataḥ kuśalavipākānte punaścyavatastisṛtiṣu durgatiṣviti caturtham ||
1294:73: 12 | bodhisattvaḥ paśyati sattvānavidyayākarmāṇi kurvato dīrgharātraṃ vedayato duḥkhāni parityajataḥsaddharmaṃ vismarato niḥsaraṇamārganityevaṃ kāraṇādutpādayati mahāmaitrīṃ karūṇāṃ pradīptaśirasrāṇavacca gaveṣayatyanuttarāṃ samyagyambodhiṃ sarvānsattvā keśaduḥkhitānahamuddharāmi niravaśeṣamiti |
1294:76: vistareṇa ceducyeta na tasya parimāṇaṃ na tasya paryantaḥ ||
1294:77: ( iti bodhicittotpādasutraśāstre bodhicittotpādo nāma dvitīyo vargaḥ ||)
